column1: The instant application was filed by the Petitioner Company (hereinafter sometimes
referred to as “the Project Proponent”) on the 22nd of June 2022 to invoke this Court’s writ
jurisdiction  in  terms  of  Article 140  of  the  Constitution  to  quash  by writs of  Certiorari  the
decisions evinced in the documents marked “P6” (dated 22nd May 2018)  and “P16b” (dated
09th September 2019) by which the 2nd Respondent refused environmental approval for the
project and the 4th Respondent affirmed the decision of the  2nd Respondent to refuse project
